description: This source file implements the worker functions for an HTTP Simple Proxy Object, handling connection acceptance, removal, data querying, processing (sync and async), send completion, and notification events within the proxy's operation. The functions manage session creation, socket handling, data transmission, and event responses in a platform-independent manner.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSpoPrvwoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Handles new incoming client connections for the HTTP proxy, creating and initializing a session object, associating buffers, and establishing the client context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPrvwoSetOut(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Stub function invoked during setting output; currently does nothing and returns success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPrvwoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Handles cleanup of client connections, releasing session resources, unbinding buffers, and closing sockets.

methods.name: ULONG HttpSpoPrvwoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data buffers, determining whether to process immediately, collect, or forward based on session state and data.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPrvwoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Performs synchronized processing of data based on the query mode, managing socket communication and session state transitions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPrvwoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPrvwoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Callback for send completion; currently a no-op returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPrvwoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles various socket events including errors, closure, and other notifications, managing session cleanup and socket state accordingly.
